messages.title: A team who will get results
messages.content: James Gibson-Watt, a hard-working local campaigner with a record of getting things done, who will work closely with Kirsty Williams AM for the people of Brecon and Radnorshire.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only James Gibson-Watt can beat the Conservatives in Brecon & Radnorshire

issues.brexitEurope: The uncertainty of Brexit leaves farming and tourism industries worried, and the community needs a team to look out for its interests.
issues.governance: Promises to fight for Brecon & Radnorshire in these challenging times.
issues.health: James Gibson-Watt has a track record of fighting NHS centralisation, opposes hospital closure and wants more nurses on hospital wards.

politicalExperience.achievements: Successful high-profile community campaigning, challenging the council's decisions on local issues, and focusing on helping people day to day.

images.caption: James Gibson-Watt will work with Kirsty Williams to protect the interests of Brecon and Radnorshire
Our MP is letting Brecon & Radnorshire down
